# AI Chat Assistant with Gemini API

This is a Next.js application that provides an AI chat interface using ModelsLab's AI models.

## Project Structure
- Frontend: Next.js with React components
- Backend: Next.js API routes
- AI Integration: 
  - Text Chat: GPT OSS 120b model via ModelsLab API
  - Image Generation: Google/NanoBanana Pro via ModelsLab API
- UI: Modern, responsive chat interface with mode switching

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement responsive design principles
- Follow Next.js best practices for API routes
- Ensure secure API key handling through environment variables
- Support both text chat and image generation modes
- Maintain consistent UI/UX across all features
